Soon, Darwin began making scientific observations of his son. He stored these notes for the time being, but later included them along with his observations of orangutans

in a book he wrote.

He cries, and then

the next moment

he laughs. His range

of emotion is

amazing.

Darwin continued to write, with his health gradually becoming worse.

Kaff-Kaff

At age 32, Darwin was in great physical pain. It was even difficult for him to write. Nonetheless, he did not quit his research.

But I want to further develop the coral reef research I performed while on the Beagle.

Something happened than,

that excited Darwin.

My

friend!

You need

to stop working and rest a while,

Honey.

Please come in, Hooker.

153
